name: The whale of space
description:
This game was made with Cocos2D and a program IF3_game-2022.3.1 created by my two teachers Bastien Gorissen & Thomas Stassin.

How to play

Press space to shoot bubbles

Use the arrow keys to move the whale

Destroy all the asteroids to win

Catch the powerup heart to win a life

Catch the powerup star to destroy the asteroid with the super whale


- I might update the game later on to spice things up -

_______________________________________________________________________________________
